metadata.name: Suspicious Package Installed - Linux
metadata.comment: Detects installation of suspicious packages using system installation utilities

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND ((endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/apt')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/apt-get'))) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('install')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/yum')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('localinstall')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('install'))) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/rpm')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-i')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/dpkg')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('--install')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-i')))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('nmap')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' nc')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('netcat')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('wireshark')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('tshark')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('openconnect')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('proxychains'))))

output.summary: Detects installation of suspicious packages using system installation utilities

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate administration activities Reference: https://gist.githubusercontent.com/MichaelKoczwara/12faba9c061c12b5814b711166de8c2f/raw/e2068486692897b620c25fde1ea258c8218fe3d3/history.txt
